name: Agriturismo Le Baccane

reviews.text: My family including 4 kids stayed there for 3 days in this summer.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay with kids!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Awesome stay with fresh air,beautiful flat, wonderful pool, nice hosts,
reviews.title: A week to remember
This is the best place to stay in Tuscany. Host family made us feel like part of family. Very clean and great farm with local pr

description: In the heart of Tuscany is located in the countryside in a very rural small farm called The Baccane led by a household and their children Angela and Jacopo Mauro and Francesca.We have several services in a warm but very very modest hospitality as if you were at home or with friends.We welcome you to our farm The Baccane.
